plot: The orchestra and choir of La Capilla Real de Madrid, played the integral of J.S. Bach's Cantatas and sacred works in Madrid churches during 8 years. This documentary follows them into the process.
title: Bach en Madrid
plot_es: The orchestra and choir of La Capilla Real de Madrid, played the integral of J.S. Bach's Cantatas and sacred works in Madrid churches during 8 years. This documentary follows them into the process.
plot_en: The orchestra and choir of La Capilla Real de Madrid, played the integral of J.S. Bach's Cantatas and sacred works in Madrid churches during 8 years. This documentary follows them into the process.
